DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Relaxation Intensified Patient Surgery Education Patients Undergoing Colorectal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: A former pilot study show preoperative relaxation program effective reduce preoperative anxiety . However intervention bias concurrent pre-surgery education . Therefore study aim test effect Preoperative Relaxation intervention Intensified Surgery Patient Education pre- postoperative wellbeing health Patients Undergoing colorectal surgery use factorial design .
